name: Bottle Shoot With Stone - 3D Bottles Shootout Training with rocks and Stones
name_original: Bottle Shoot With Stone - 3D Bottles Shootout Training with rocks and Stones
description:
Do you love shooting? And do you like hit the bottles and the sound of breaking bottles? Blast bottles, play mini-games, and compete all over the World!Play bottle Shoot with stone , the effects in the game are very cool!bottle Shoot with stone is about shooting as many bottles as you can in the fixed amount of time.

Only if you can do both will you become a real bottle shooter ! Every round is harder, than the last. There is also bonus level you can break the bottle without obstacle such as bombs and shields.

If you like fun and addictive game_bottle shoot with stone for you.Game rules are fairy simple.You have throw the stone by swipe your finger to break the bottle.Donn't miss any bottle to get high score. Bottle shoot with stone game_many levels to bottle shoot.In next to level coming and bottle colours and effect will be change also.In next to level you can quested to play again and again.This game is specailly for every age of user .This game is full of fun.

Feature:

- 5 different bottle design: Beer, Vodka, Wine, Whiskey & Champagne
- Photo- realistic Bottle
- Realistic shooting and bottle explosion sounds
- High quality sound effect
- Many colour Bottles
- Play Wind to get wind effect on stone.
-Universal game for Iphone and Ipad
